summary: A Botswanan woman starts up the country's first female-owned detective agency. Based on the series of novels by Alexander McCall Smith.
cast: Jill Scott|Anika Noni Rose|Lucian Msamati|Nikki Amuka-Bird|Desmond Dube|Tumisho Masha|Bongeka Mpongwana|David Oyelowo|John Kani|Vusi Kunene|Harriet Lenabe|Colin Salmon|Idris Elba|Lindani Nkosi|Vasco Shoba|Kabelo Thai|Percy Matsemela|Tau Maserumule|Thabo Malema|Tshepo Maphanyane|Shombi Ellis|Brendan Kupa|Motsheresanyi Sefanyetso|Kudrah Alabi|Khudaga Kagiso|Kgomotso Delia Tshwenyego|Karabo Mpai|Pascar Proctor|Sandiswe Mdiza|Vuyisele Otukile|Rebagamang Sekgekge|Sapphire Seeletso|Mpho Pheko|Keeletsang Pelaelo|Seingwaeng Kgafela|Ikanyeng Dipatane|Pauline Mana Letsatle|Thatayaone Mongwedisle|Losika 'Luzboy' Seboni|Kgosi Goodwill|Winston Ntshona
title: The No. 1 Ladies' Detective Agency
